Nordic Hack

Imagine tomorrow by hacking today

23 - 24. Feb

Sofiendalsvej 60, Aalborg

What is a Hackathon?

First of all a hackathon has nothing to do with “hacking” with malicious intent as it is known today. A hackathon is a invention marathon where people with all sorts of backgrounds get together and build interesting things. A hackathon is not limited to developers and computer science majors - Anyone with a interest in tech can participate.
